lines:
Luk. & The Chinese students Confere

Trenity bolbge

~ Hartford, conn. 
1956. DE 19 August 1910.

| Phillips

Andover.

My Wear Mr. Steams,

2 came to Hartford 
three days ago for the coming 
Students Conference. Before 
that time I had been studying 
English & Mathematics in 
Boston under prevate tutors 
for abment about two

montes. For this reason 
I had spent more money 
this summer thans I did 
ng finance is now a 
little bit in shortager
raw: Luk. & The Chinese students Confere  Trenity bolbge  ~ Hartford, conn.  1956. DE 19 August 1910.  | Phillips  Andover.  My Wear Mr. Steams,  2 came to Hartford  three days ago for the coming  Students Conference. Before  that time I had been studying  English & Mathematics in  Boston under prevate tutors  for abment about two  montes. For this reason  I had spent more money  this summer thans I did  ng finance is now a  little bit in shortager

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Handwritten letter from Sung Sing Kwan stating that because he took classes in English and mathematics in Boston with private tutors, his finances are depleted. He requests $50 for expenses for the conference.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
